software.title: Software <1>Development</1>
software.text: Experienced in OOP and functional programming with Java, Python, JavaScript, and C++. Strong foundation in algorithms and problem-solving.

fullstack.title: Full Stack <1>Development</1>
fullstack.text: Building responsive web apps using React, Next.js, Node.js, and Express. Skilled in REST APIs, authentication, and real-time integrations.

database.title: Database <1>Systems</1>
database.text: Proficient in PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and SQL. Experience designing relational schemas, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity.

project1.title: Eco Life Etiqo'd
project1.description: Eco-Life Etiqod is a wellness resort website showcasing natural spring water, buffet dining, and a cozy family-friendly atmosphere. It features a responsive multi-page layout with modern design and smooth interactions. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, the project delivers an engaging user experience across all devices.

project2.title: Mazzo Premium
project2.description: Mazzo Premium is an elegant e-commerce showcase featuring premium products, styled with refined visuals and intuitive navigation. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, the site delivers a seamless, responsive user experience.

footer.title: Available for freelance opportunities
footer.description: Have an exciting project you need help with? Send me an email or contact me via instant message!
